prompts: Create a Normal-type Pokemon with a bird-like appearance and two heads.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a vibrant yellow body and is always on the move.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a flightless bird with unique double-headed traits.
Generate a creature that thrives in grassy environments and has a quirky personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a playful demeanor and distinctive, sturdy legs.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that's small yet energetic, perfect for urban areas.
Make a wild Pokemon that showcases the beauty of two heads in its design.
